data.title: Odell Beckham Jr. And Kim Kardashian’s Relationship Remains ‘Pretty Casual’
data.meta_description: The couple began dating in September 2023.
data.text:
Odell Beckham Jr. and Kim Kardashian are taking things slow.

After nearly five months of dating, a source told PEOPLE that the couple are “still hanging out, but it’s pretty casual.” Still, these two are on the same page about the pace of their relationship.

"Neither of them are in any big hurry to jump into something serious,” the insider continued.

A budding romance began with the SKIMS co-founder and the Baltimore Ravens wide receiver in September 2023. That same month, the NFL player and his ex-girlfriend Lauren Wood –whom he shares son, Zydn, with– officially called it quits after nearly four years together.

Kardashian also attended the athlete's 31st birthday celebration in September in New York, as reported by PEOPLE.

The reality star is a mom of four who co-parents North, 10, Saint, 8, Chicago, 6, and Psalm, 4, with ex-husband Kanye West.
